about_the_game:
Spend a vacation in your favorite pool, watching rubber ducks. This relaxing game will give you rest and tranquility, which you have long needed.

A variety of ducks will join you so that you do not feel lonely.

A day off, an audiomagnetic plays light jazz, and you lie on a sun lounger and sip your drink. Autumn is approaching. Somewhere in the distance, birds fly.
With the advent of the night, nothing stops, soft light envelops you, reflected from the water surface of the pool. Around you flutter fireflies.

For some reason, the ducks in the pool form a strange figure, but why worry?



If you are a streamer on Twitch, then you can easily and simply enable integration in the main menu or in the settings during the game.
To do this, only enter the name of your Twitch channel.
After successful integration, all new ducks will have the names of your active viewers who write in the chat.

highlighted.name: Fire Is Mightier Than a Pen

detailed_description:
Feature List

  • Spacious pool
  • You can give ducks names
  • Various events
  • Comfortable chair
  • 50 different rubber (and not only rubber) ducks
  • Integration with twitch - ducks will be called the names of the audience
  • Change of time of day
  • Relaxing Lofi Music
  • 1 giant duck


About the Game

Spend a vacation in your favorite pool, watching rubber ducks. This relaxing game will give you rest and tranquility, which you have long needed.

A variety of ducks will join you so that you do not feel lonely.

A day off, an audiomagnetic plays light jazz, and you lie on a sun lounger and sip your drink. Autumn is approaching. Somewhere in the distance, birds fly.
With the advent of the night, nothing stops, soft light envelops you, reflected from the water surface of the pool. Around you flutter fireflies.

For some reason, the ducks in the pool form a strange figure, but why worry?



If you are a streamer on Twitch, then you can easily and simply enable integration in the main menu or in the settings during the game.
To do this, only enter the name of your Twitch channel.
After successful integration, all new ducks will have the names of your active viewers who write in the chat.
name: Watch Your Plastic Duck

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with OpenGL ES 3 support
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Small rubber ducks calmly swim in the pool and you can watch them to relaxing music. What can go wrong?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Danish, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Greek, Belarusian, Irish, Icelandic, Catalan, Latvian, Lithuanian, Serbian, Croatian, Estonian
